oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Mary Lee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A woman stands in front of a U. S. Army war poster which says, "The more we produce, the quicker this will end."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Posters; War posters
Johnson, Mary Lee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This image appeared in the Roane-Anderson News of March 23, 1945 with the caption, "Mrs. Mary Lee Johnson, Roane-Anderson Timekeeping Department, Husband, Capt. Mauritz Johnson, U. S. Army Air Forces, missing in action over France since July 1944. Mrs. Johnson came here to work on a War Project while waiting for news of her husband."
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Physical rights are retained by the institution. Copyright is retained in accordance with U. S. Copyright laws.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Oak Ridge Public Library, 1401 Oak Ridge Trpke, Oak Ridge, TN 37830 reference@oakridgetn.gov
